text: Sukhumi or Sokhumi () is the capital and largest city of the breakaway independent state of Abkhazia. Sokhumi was a multi-ethnic city. The people were Georgians, Abkhazians (Apsuans), Russians, Turks, Armenians and Greeks during Soviet Rule. During the Georgian-Abkhaz conflict, Georgians in Abkhazia were forced to leave. Most Greeks have also left. ==References== Category:Europe Category:Caucasus Category:Abkhazia Category:Eastern Europe Category:Capital cities in Asia Category:Capital cities in Europe Category:Settlements in Georgia (country) Category:Port cities and towns of the Black Sea
title: Sokhumi
